Articles.Content:
Hi all. I just wanted to show you my new ship which had a scanner and a lander onboard. I had great fun piloting both craft individually on the same mission which was to visit a Mun anomaly....I found this strange floating monolith type thing in the Midlands Crater

This was designed as a one way mission so I can build a rover (which ive never done) and go rescue Bill, who is 3km away from his lander and he's too lazy to walk back!

Edited September 10, 2015 by maceemiller

How did you get this information? That is strictly classified. Agents have been dispatched to your current location. Activating memetic agent.

This memetic agent is lethal within 30 minutes, unless counter-meme is administered. Please remain at your current location.

Have a nice day.

I bet that wasn't planned.....

Actually, I did plan to find this. My scan of the Mun revealed its location so I landed close to it and there it was. Not as difficult as you may think.

Actually, I did plan to find this. My scan of the Mun revealed its location so I landed close to it and there it was. Not as difficult as you may think.

One of the more fun things I've done in KSP was to send out missions to scan all the bodies with probes, then send down manned lander/rovers to take a look at all the anomalies.
